name: Automated Test Framework
short_description:
Automated Test Framework (ATF) is a functional test framework built on top of the existing Perl test harness.  Currently it provides a simple interface for running tests in command line/shell environments on local and remote test target systems.  The overall goal is to provide a simplified domain specific embedded language for testing.

This is being published primarily to accompany a presentation on a test framework being used for verification of various firmware components that must operate together.
